item.description:
Hi Everyone!

Our Friend and member of the Club, Carolina Arentsen is having an art sale this Thursday in Providence from 4 to 11 p.m.

This is not going to be an official Meetup-meeting, just thought about promoting her art here on our site for those who are interested and want to go check out the art sale!!! I am sure it is going to be really interesting!

I know it is a little on the short notice, but I hope many of you can stop by the art sale. I unfortunately cannot make it this time. I have guests from home and we are going to be on the road on Thursday!

Hope to see you all soon, however!

Take care - bis bald,

- Hanna
item.name: Art Sale by Carolina Arentsen! - “Pre-Internet Artwork” Trunk Sale.
